title: Heartopia
description: A cozy life-simulation game where you wake up on a magical island with unique superpowers. Build your dream home, farm magical crops, and befriend the charming residents. Heartopia combines the relaxation of Animal Crossing with a touch of fantasy magic, allowing you to fly, use telekinesis, and shape the world around you.

title: Cozy Caravan
description: Hit the open road in a delightful top-down adventure. You play as a small animal driving a caravan, traveling from town to town. Set up mobile markets, craft items, and help the locals in a game designed purely for relaxation and good vibes.

title: Pathologic 3
description: Ice-Pick Lodge returns to the eerie steppe town in this sequel to the cult classic survival thriller. Pathologic 3 introduces new time-travel mechanics, allowing players to revisit key moments of the outbreak. Play as the Bachelor, Dankovsky, and use scientific methods to fight a plague that defies logic.

title: Quarantine Zone: The Last Check
description: A tense border control simulator set during a deadly pandemic. As a checkpoint officer, you must inspect vehicles, verify documents, and decide who enters the safety zone. Balance resources, maintain order, and face moral dilemmas in a world falling apart.

title: Streetdog BMX
description: An extreme sports game that blends Tony Hawk-style arcade scoring with open-world exploration. Ride through six massive districts, finding secret spots and pulling off insane tricks. Customize your bike and rider as you conquer the urban landscape.

title: Cassette Boy
description: A unique puzzle RPG where the world rotates around you. Inspired by the Game Boy era, Cassette Boy uses a 'rotatable' inventory system that affects the environment. Solve puzzles and battle monsters by manipulating the perspective of the 2D world.

title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon
description: The 20th anniversary title of the Trails series (Kai no Kiseki) finally reaches the west. Van Arkride's story reaches its climax in the Republic of Calvard. Featuring a refined battle system that seamlessly switches between action and turn-based command, this entry promises to answer long-standing mysteries of the Zemurian continent.

title: Brokenlore: Unfollow
description: A surreal first-person horror game about the dark side of social media. You play as a victim of bullying fighting terrifying monsters that represent your insecurities. The game explores relevant themes of mental health and online harassment.

title: Ghetto Zombies Graffiti Squad
description: A stylish beat 'em up where street art meets the undead apocalypse. Control a squad of graffiti artists defending their neighborhood from zombies. Use spray cans as weapons and tag the walls to gain buffs in this vibrant, hip-hop inspired brawler.

title: Carnedge
description: A retro-styled horror shooter set in a twisted carnival. Fight off killer clowns and mutated attractions using a variety of rusty weapons. The game features a PS1-era aesthetic and fast-paced, arcade-like gameplay.

title: Duet Night Abyss
description: A high-fantasy adventure RPG featuring dual protagonists. Switch between two characters with contrasting abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies in real-time combat. The game boasts anime-style visuals and a deep weapon customization system.

title: MIO: Memories In Orbit
description: Explore the Vessel, a gigantic spaceship drifting through space, in this stunning Metroidvania. Play as MIO, an agile android, as you uncover the ship's past and fight rogue machines. The game features fluid movement and a distinctive art style.

title: Eldegarde
description: A tactical RPG where you manage a fortress under siege. Recruit heroes, build defenses, and engage in grid-based combat against an encroaching empire. The game emphasizes resource management and permadeath mechanics.

title: TR-49
description: A minimalist sci-fi adventure about a robot delivering a package across a desolate planet. Manage your battery life and navigate hazardous terrain in this atmospheric journey. The game focuses on environmental storytelling and solitude.

title: Arknights: Endfield
description: A 3D real-time RPG with strategic factory-building elements set in the Arknights universe. Explore the dangerous planet of Talos-II, build automated production lines, and lead a squad of operators in combat. Endfield expands the lore of the franchise with a new cast and gameplay style.

title: Hermit and Pig
description: A turn-based RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. Explore a quirky world, forage for rare mushrooms, and fight enemies using knowledge of the wilderness. A charming and humorous game with a unique combat system based on foraging.

title: Escape The Ever After
description: A fairytale roguelike where you play as storybook characters trying to escape their written destinies. Fight through twisted versions of classic tales, from Red Riding Hood to Hansel and Gretel. Features beautiful hand-drawn art and co-op gameplay.

title: The Fortress
description: A tower defense game with a dark fantasy aesthetic. Design and build intricate fortresses to withstand waves of shadowy monsters. The game features a complex physics system where structural integrity matters.

title: Highguard
description: A third-person action game where you protect a floating city from sky pirates. Use aerial combat mechanics and grappling hooks to navigate the vertical environment. The game emphasizes speed and aerial maneuverability.

title: Conquest Tactics
description: A hex-based strategy game focusing on multiplayer battles. Build your army from various factions and outmaneuver your opponent on dynamic maps. A modern take on classic wargaming with streamlined mechanics.

title: Earth Must Die
description: Play as the alien invader in this reverse-defense game. Deploy saucers, walkers, and giant monsters to destroy human cities. Upgrade your arsenal and wipe out humanity level by level.

title: Rightfully, Beary Arms
description: A bullet-hell roguelike where you play as a cute bear fighting through space dungeons. Collect powerful guns, dodge endless waves of bullets, and defeat goofy bosses. The game features a cartoon art style and challenging gameplay.

title: Underground Garage
description: A mechanic simulator focused on tuning and street racing. Buy beat-up cars, fix them, install custom parts, and test them on the streets. The game bridges the gap between Car Mechanic Simulator and Need for Speed.

title: Lanesplit
description: A high-speed motorcycle racing game set on procedurally generated highways. Weave through traffic, outrun the police, and upgrade your bike. The game captures the thrill and danger of illegal street racing.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin
description: An open-world action RPG set in the multiverse of the popular anime series. Featuring high-fidelity graphics and destructible environments, players can explore Britannia, fly freely, and engage in real-time combat with a new original story.

title: Cairn
description: A realistic climbing survival game from the creators of Furi. Ascend a colossal, deadly mountain where every handhold matters. Manage your stamina, equipment, and route finding in a harrowing journey to the summit.

title: Dark Auction: Hitler's Estate
description: A mystery adventure game where you explore a spooky estate to auction off artifacts. However, the items are cursed and connected to a dark history. Interact with a strange cast of characters and solve puzzles to survive the auction.

title: I Hate This Place
description: A twin-stick shooter roguelite set in a cursed house that constantly changes layout. Use weird weapons and items to fight off pests, ghosts, and interdimensional horrors. A fast-paced game with a quirky sense of humor.

title: Ufophilia
description: A found-footage horror game about hunting UFOs. Explore rural landscapes with your camcorder, looking for signs of extraterrestrial life. The game builds tension through silence and atmospheric sound design.

title: Code Vein 2
description: The highly anticipated sequel to the 'Anime Dark Souls'. Code Vein 2 takes players beyond the Red Mist into a wider, ruined world. Expect a deeper Blood Code system, more complex character creation, and a story that further connects the Revenants to the God Eater universe.

title: Folklore Hunter
description: A co-op horror shooter where you hunt creatures from folklore like the Wendigo and Skinwalkers. Set traps, track your prey, and survive the night in dense forests. The game emphasizes teamwork and careful planning.

title: My Tiny Garden
description: A relaxing gardening sandbox game. Plant flowers, decorate your garden with cute furniture, and watch the seasons change. There are no objectives or timers, just a peaceful space to create your own digital zen garden.

title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined
description: Experience the timeless classic reborn in this stunning reimagining of Dragon Quest VII. Journey to the island of Estard and uncover the secrets of a fragmented world by traveling through time to restore forgotten lands. With completely overhauled graphics that blend modern fidelity with Toriyama's signature art style, a refined vocation system, and a sweeping orchestral score, this is the definitive way to experience one of the deepest adventures in the Dragon Quest saga.

title: My Hero Academia: All's Justice
description: The ultimate battle for justice begins in this high-octane 3D arena fighter set during the climactic Final War arc of My Hero Academia. Featuring the largest roster in the series' history, players can command heroes and villains in their most powerful forms. The game introduces a new 'Rising' mechanic that amplifies Quirks for devastating combos, alongside a dramatic story mode that allows you to relive key moments from the anime's conclusion.

title: Nioh 3
description: Team Ninja returns with the next evolution of their acclaimed dark fantasy samurai action series. Nioh 3 takes players to a new historical era, blending rigorous, fast-paced combat with deep RPG customization. Face off against terrifying Yokai and human masters alike using an expanded arsenal of weapons and Yokai abilities, all while unraveling a gritty narrative steeped in Japanese mythology and history.

title: Mewgenics
description: From the creators of The Binding of Isaac comes a bizarre and deeply strategic cat-breeding roguelike simulation. Hoard, breed, and train a clowder of mutated cats as you navigate a chaotic world filled with slapstick violence and scientific monstrosities. Manage unique genetic traits to create the ultimate feline warrior or a complete genetic disaster in this long-awaited indie title.

title: Reanimal
description: The original creators of Little Nightmares invite you on a terrifying new co-op journey into hell. Play as a brother and sister trapped on a nightmarish island, exploring by boat and on land to rescue their missing friends. Reanimal emphasizes tension, atmosphere, and cooperative puzzle-solving as you evade grotesque monstrosities in a world that feels unsettlingly familiar yet utterly twisted.

title: High on Life 2
description: The talking guns are back in this hilarious and chaotic sequel to the hit comedy FPS. High on Life 2 expands the universe with new biomes, weirder aliens, and an arsenal of fresh, chatty weaponry. Expect more fourth-wall-breaking humor, improved traversal mechanics including a jetpack-skateboard hybrid, and a story that takes the bounty hunting action to a galactic scale.

title: Ys X: Proud Nordics
description: Adol Christin returns in a high-seas adventure set in the northern islands of Obelia Bay. Ys X: Proud Nordics features fast-paced 'Cross Action' combat where players control Adol and the pirate princess Karja simultaneously. Explore the vast ocean aboard a fully customizable ship, engage in naval battles, and uncover the mystery of the undying 'Griegers' in this exhilarating entry to the legendary action RPG series.

title: Resident Evil Requiem
description: Capcom returns to survival horror with Resident Evil Requiem, a title that promises to bridge the gap between classic tension and modern action. Embody FBI analyst Grace Ashcroft in a narrative that intertwines with the dark history of Raccoon City. Utilizing the RE Engine, the game delivers photorealistic visuals and visceral combat as you face new bioweapons and uncover a sinister conspiracy that threatens to unleash a global outbreak.

title: Scott Pilgrim EX
description: Level up again with Scott Pilgrim EX, a brand-new beat 'em up adventure developed by the team behind the original cult classic game. Featuring stunning new pixel art, a fresh soundtrack by Anamanaguchi, and expanded movesets, players can team up online or locally to battle through a new league of evil exes. The story picks up after the anime series, offering a fresh canonical chapter in the Scott Pilgrim universe.

title: Marathon
description: Bungie resurrects their classic sci-fi franchise as a PvP extraction shooter. In Marathon, players become cybernetic mercenaries known as Runners, exploring a lost colony on the planet Tau Ceti IV. The game focuses on high-stakes survival, where securing loot and extracting alive is the only way to progress. With a striking visual art style and deep lore, Marathon aims to redefine the extraction shooter genre.

title: Monster Hunter Stories 3
description: Ride on! Monster Hunter Stories 3 continues the beloved turn-based RPG spin-off series. Players take on the role of a Rider who forms bonds with monsters ('Monsties') to fight alongside them. This entry introduces a vast new open world, enhanced kinship mechanics, and a story centered around a mysterious phenomenon affecting monster behavior. Prepare to hatch, raise, and battle with fan-favorite monsters in a vibrant, anime-inspired adventure.

title: Crimson Desert
description: Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure set in the continent of Pywel, a war-torn land of harsh beauty. You play as Macduff, a mercenary fighting to reclaim his lost land and lead his band of warriors. The game promises a gritty, realistic combat system, deep storytelling, and a living, breathing world filled with political intrigue, mythical beasts, and survival challenges.

title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire
description: Dive into a gritty, jazz-fueled noir city in this unique FPS that mimics the rubber hose animation style of the 1930s. As private investigator John Mouston, you'll battle mobsters and unravel conspiracies using a variety of classic firearms and cartoon physics. The monochrome visuals and hand-drawn animations create a distinct atmosphere that blends retro charm with violent, fast-paced shooter gameplay.

title: Life is Strange: Reunion
description: Max Caulfield and Chloe Price return in a direct sequel to the original game. Life is Strange: Reunion explores the long-term consequences of the storm in Arcadia Bay (or the choice to sacrifice it), bringing the duo back together for a new emotional mystery. With evolved time-manipulation mechanics and a mature narrative about trauma and friendship, this is the reunion fans have been waiting for.

title: Pragmata
description: Set in a dystopian near-future on Earth's moon, Pragmata is a mysterious sci-fi action-adventure from Capcom. The game follows a soldier and a young girl with strange powers as they navigate a desolate lunar world. Expect mind-bending physics, cutting-edge visuals powered by the RE Engine, and a story that explores the relationship between humanity and technology in a cold, beautiful setting.

title: Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred
description: The saga of Sanctuary continues in this massive expansion for Diablo IV. Lord of Hatred introduces the jungle region of Nahantu, a new Spiritborn class, and a continuation of the prime evil storyline involving Mephisto. Players can expect new dungeons, raids, and gameplay systems that deepen the endgame experience, along with darker, more visceral storytelling.

title: 007 First Light
description: IO Interactive, the studio behind Hitman, delivers the ultimate spy fantasy in 007 First Light. This original James Bond origin story allows players to earn their 00 status in a globe-trotting adventure. Featuring a mix of stealth, tactical combat, and high-speed chases, the game promises to capture the sophistication and danger of the Bond universe without being tied to a specific film actor's likeness.

title: Phantom Blade Zero
description: Phantom Blade Zero is a fast-paced action RPG featuring a unique 'Kungfupunk' art style that blends traditional Chinese martial arts with steampunk elements. You play as Soul, an elite assassin with only 66 days left to live, fighting against powerful foes and unraveling a dark conspiracy. The game features a semi-open world and lightning-fast combat reminiscent of classic martial arts cinema.

title: Grand Theft Auto VI
description: Rockstar Games returns to Vice City and the surrounding state of Leonida in the most immersive open-world experience ever created. Grand Theft Auto VI follows the story of Lucia and her partner in a Bonnie and Clyde-inspired crime drama. Expect unparalleled attention to detail, a satirical take on modern culture, and a massive evolution in gameplay mechanics, setting a new standard for the industry.

title: The 18th Attic
description: A psychological horror indie game that traps players in a shifting, endless attic. Solve cryptic puzzles and evade a stalking presence as you uncover the history of the house's previous inhabitants. With a lo-fi visual style and oppressive atmosphere, The 18th Attic challenges your perception of reality.

title: Crimson Capes
description: A narrative-driven indie RPG about a group of retired superheroes forced back into action. Crimson Capes combines turn-based tactical combat with visual novel storytelling, exploring themes of aging, legacy, and the cost of heroism in a world that has moved on.

title: Unemployment Simulator 2018
description: A dark comedy simulation game that tasks players with navigating the absurdities of job hunting in a digital age. Manage your stress levels, craft the perfect resume, and endure bizarre interviews in this satirical take on modern life struggles.

title: Dead Pets: A Punk Rock Slice Of Life Sim
description: Live the gritty life of a struggling punk rocker in a city full of anthropomorphic animals. Manage your band, write songs, work terrible day jobs, and make hard choices that affect your relationships and career. Dead Pets offers a heartfelt and stylish look at the underground music scene.

title: Ghost Gunners
description: A fast-paced twin-stick shooter where you control a squad of spectral operatives. Fight through procedurally generated neon-lit levels, upgrade your ghostly weapons, and take down mega-corporations in the afterlife.

title: HumanityZ
description: An open-world zombie survival game played from a top-down perspective. Scavenge for resources, build a base, and drive vehicles across a massive map teeming with the undead. HumanityZ focuses on realistic survival mechanics and cooperative play.

title: Relooted
description: A dungeon crawler focused entirely on loot management and inventory tetris. Relooted challenges players to not just find treasure, but figure out how to carry it all out of the dungeon while fighting off monsters with whatever gear isn't packed away.

title: The Prisoning: Fletcher's Quest
description: A charming pixel-art adventure about a wrongly accused knight named Fletcher. Escape from the king's dungeon, gather evidence to prove your innocence, and interact with a cast of quirky characters in this humorous fantasy tale.

title: Romeo is a Dead Man
description: A stylish action game that reimagines Shakespeare's tragedy as a noir revenge thriller. Play as a resurrected Romeo seeking vengeance on the houses of Montague and Capulet in a futuristic Verona. The game features rhythmic combat and a unique visual style inspired by graphic novels.

title: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X
description: An expanded version of the hit action roguelite spinoff. Dive into the Phenomenon Intervention with new characters from the BlazBlue universe, enhanced elemental systems, and a deeper story mode. Master the unique combat styles of different fighters as you challenge procedurally generated levels.

title: Disciples: Domination
description: A dark fantasy turn-based strategy game where you lead a cult to world domination. Manage resources, summon eldritch horrors, and engage in tactical grid-based combat against rival factions and holy orders trying to stop your ascension.

title: Mario Tennis Fever
description: Mario and friends return to the court in this high-energy sports title for the next-generation Nintendo console. Mario Tennis Fever introduces 'Fever Mode', a mechanic that speeds up gameplay and unleashes spectacular special shots. With a robust story mode and online tournaments, it's the most competitive Mario Tennis yet.

title: Ride 6
description: The definitive motorcycle racing simulation returns with unparalleled realism. Ride 6 features hundreds of licensed bikes, laser-scanned tracks from around the world, and a new dynamic weather system that affects handling in real-time. The career mode has been revamped to offer a deep progression system for aspiring pro riders.

title: Clue: Murder by Death
description: A fresh digital adaptation of the classic board game, featuring a darker, more mature tone. Players must solve a murder mystery in a sprawling mansion, interrogating suspects and finding clues. The game offers both a faithful recreation of the board game and a new narrative-driven mode.

title: Dobbel Dungeon
description: A dice-based roguelike where your fate is determined by the roll of the die. Battle through dungeons using a unique combat system where dice rolls determine your attack power and defense. Collect special dice and relics to manipulate luck in your favor.

title: Menherarium
description: A visual novel that explores themes of mental health and connection in a digital world. Navigate complex relationships and branching dialogue paths in an emotional story about finding hope in dark places. The game features a distinct pastel art style and a haunting original soundtrack.

title: Strange Brew
description: Manage a magical coffee shop in a fantasy world. Brew potions disguised as lattes for orcs, elves, and adventurers. Upgrade your shop, learn new recipes, and listen to the stories of your patrons in this cozy and relaxing management sim.

title: The Killing Stone
description: A folk horror adventure set in a remote village in feudal Japan. Investigate the legend of the Sessho-seki (Killing Stone) and the spirits trapped within. Solve environmental puzzles and uncover a tragic history in this atmospheric narrative game.

title: Demon Tides
description: A hack-and-slash action game where you battle waves of aquatic demons invading a coastal kingdom. Use fluid combat mechanics and elemental magic to push back the tide. The game features fast-paced gameplay inspired by classic arcade brawlers.

title: Love Eternal
description: A challenging platformer about escaping a dark, labyrinthine castle. Manipulate gravity and reality to solve puzzles and avoid deadly traps. The game explores themes of obsession and loss through its abstract storytelling and difficult gameplay.

title: Styx: Blades of Greed
description: The master goblin assassin returns in a new stealth adventure. Styx: Blades of Greed offers larger, more vertical levels and new magical abilities. Infiltrate a dwarven fortress to steal a legendary artifact, using shadows, traps, and deception to remain unseen.

title: Rainbow Six Mobile
description: The acclaimed tactical shooter Rainbow Six Siege comes to mobile devices. Experience intense 5v5 close-quarters combat with destructible environments and a roster of iconic operators. The game has been optimized for touch controls while maintaining the strategic depth of the console version.

title: Tides of Tomorrow
description: A narrative adventure set on an ocean planet facing an ecological crisis. Explore alien waters, document marine life, and make choices that determine the fate of the ecosystem. The game emphasizes exploration and environmental storytelling.

title: Reigns: The Witcher
description: Swipe left or right to rule the Continent in this Witcher-themed spinoff of the popular Reigns series. Make difficult decisions as Geralt, Yennefer, or Ciri to balance the needs of the people, the monsters, and the magic. A simple yet deep strategy game full of lore and humor.

title: Tales of Berseria Remastered
description: Velvet Crowe's tale of revenge returns with enhanced graphics and performance. This remaster of the fan-favorite JRPG improves the combat framerate and visual fidelity, bringing the emotional story and beloved cast to modern consoles.

title: Gnaughty Gnomes
description: A chaotic multiplayer party game where you play as mischievous gnomes sabotaging a suburban garden. Set traps, hide from humans, and steal socks in this hilarious physics-based sandbox game.

title: Homura Hime
description: A 3D action game featuring intense magical girl combat. Play as Homura Hime, an exorcist who battles demons born from human emotions. The game features stylized anime visuals and fast-paced boss battles.

title: Never Grace: The Witch and the Curse
description: An action-adventure game about a young witch breaking a generational curse. Explore a beautiful hand-painted world, craft spells, and fight corrupted spirits. The game combines platforming with light RPG elements.

title: Lost and Found Co.
description: A colorful hidden object game where you help a magical agency retrieve lost items. Search through vibrant, interactive scenes filled with animated characters and secrets. A relaxing and charming puzzle experience.

title: 1348 Ex Voto
description: A historical survival horror game set during the Black Death in medieval Europe. Armed only with a torch and your faith, navigate a plague-ridden monastery filled with nightmarish visions. The game focuses on atmosphere and resource management.

title: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly Remake
description: The masterpiece of Japanese horror returns, fully remade for modern hardware. Sisters Mio and Mayu are trapped in the Lost Village, haunted by tormented spirits. Use the Camera Obscura to fend off ghosts in this terrifying and emotional story, now featuring an over-the-shoulder camera and photorealistic graphics.

title: MLB The Show 26
description: The premier baseball simulation returns with new features and updated rosters. MLB The Show 26 introduces an expanded Storylines mode celebrating baseball legends and improved fielding mechanics. Experience the thrill of the diamond with the most realistic graphics and animations to date.

title: Dynasty Warriors 3: Complete Edition Remastered
description: Relive the classic Musou action that defined a genre. Dynasty Warriors 3 returns with HD visuals and modern quality-of-life improvements. Fight through massive armies in the Three Kingdoms era, now with smoother framerates and all content from the Xtreme Legends expansion included.

title: Ghost Master: Resurrection
description: The cult classic haunting simulator is back. Command a team of ghosts, banshees, and poltergeists to scare mortals out of their homes. Use creative combinations of powers to solve puzzles and cause maximum chaos in this strategic and humorous game.

title: Rubato
description: A rhythmic platformer where you control a mischievous frog collecting musical notes. Jump, dash, and tongue-grapple to the beat of a catchy soundtrack. Rubato combines precision platforming with music theory puzzles.

title: Ariana and the Elder Codex
description: A classic-style RPG inspired by 90s adventures. Join Ariana, a young scholar, as she uncovers the secrets of an ancient civilization. The game features turn-based combat, a rich world map, and a heartfelt story about discovery.

title: Copa City
description: The first football tycoon game where you manage the event, not the team. Copa City puts you in charge of organizing high-stakes matches in major cities. Manage logistics, security, and fan entertainment to create the perfect football festival.

title: Screamer
description: A high-octane arcade racer with a horror twist. Race through nightmare landscapes while being chased by monstrous entities. Screamer combines drift-heavy driving mechanics with survival horror elements.

title: Before I Go
description: An emotional narrative game about a ghost trying to resolve their unfinished business. Explore the memories of your past life and influence the world of the living to say your final goodbyes. A touching story about love, regret, and acceptance.

title: ShantyTown
description: A survival city-builder where you manage a growing settlement in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Scavenge materials, build makeshift structures, and defend your community from raiders and the elements. The game focuses on resourcefulness and community management.

title: Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream
description: The quirky Mii life simulator makes its long-awaited return. Create Mii characters of your friends and watch them live out hilarious and unpredictable lives on an island. Now with deeper customization, online sharing features, and even weirder dreams.

title: Invincible Vs.
description: A brutal fighting game set in the Invincible universe. Play as Mark Grayson, Omni-Man, Atom Eve, and other powerful characters. Featuring destructive environments and gory finishing moves that capture the visceral style of the comic and animated series.

title: Saros
description: A stunning new sci-fi RPG exploring a galaxy on the brink of collapse. Pilot your starship, explore alien planets, and engage in real-time combat. Saros promises a deep narrative about ancient civilizations and the price of progress.

title: Corsairs - Battle of the Caribbean
description: A revival of the classic pirate strategy game. Command a fleet of ships, trade goods, and fight for dominance in the Caribbean. The game blends tactical naval combat with economic management and RPG elements.

title: Bubsy 4D
description: The bobcat is back in a dimension-shattering platformer. Bubsy 4D features time-travel mechanics and levels that fold in on themselves. Love him or hate him, Bubsy returns with more puns and challenging platforming action.

title: Stonemachia
description: A fast-paced shooter set in a world made entirely of stone. Use seismic weaponry to shatter enemies and manipulate the environment. The unique destructible terrain mechanics make every battle a chaotic spectacle.

title: Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight
description: A massive new Lego adventure covering the entire history of Batman. From the campy 60s era to the gritty modern films, play through iconic storylines with a comedic Lego twist. Features an open-world Gotham City and hundreds of playable characters.

title: 1999Tokoyo Building
description: A surreal indie game set in a mysterious Tokyo skyscraper at the turn of the millennium. Explore the building's strange floors, meet eccentric tenants, and uncover a digital conspiracy. The game features a retro aesthetic inspired by PS1-era graphics.

title: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Thieve
description: Project Aces returns with the next mainline entry in the premier flight action series. Ace Combat 8 promises photorealistic graphics, intense dogfights, and a gripping war drama narrative. New weather effects and cloud technology will make aerial combat more immersive than ever.

title: Acts of Blood
description: A brutal beat 'em up set in a dystopian city overrun by gangs. Use improvised weapons and visceral martial arts to clean up the streets. The game emphasizes fluid animation and satisfying impact in its combat system.

title: Aeterna Lucis
description: The sequel to Aeterna Noctis, this Metroidvania continues the saga of the King of Darkness. Explore a vast, interconnected world filled with challenging platforming and epic boss fights. The game features stunning hand-drawn art and a high skill ceiling.

title: Agefield High: Rock The School
description: A rhythm game mixed with high school drama. Form a band, write songs, and battle rival music clubs to save the school's arts program. The game combines visual novel storytelling with guitar-hero style rhythm gameplay.

title: Aniimo
description: A whimsical adventure game set in a world of living origami. Explore a paper-crafted universe, fold and unfold the environment to solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the 'Great Crease'. A visually unique game with a relaxing atmosphere.

title: Aphelion
description: A hard sci-fi space simulation game. Captain a starship in a realistic galaxy, managing crew, systems, and resources. Aphelion offers a deep simulation experience with Newtonian physics and complex political factions.

title: A Planet Full of Cats
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you arrange cats on a spherical planet. Fit all the adorable felines into the available space without them falling off. A charming and low-stress game for cat lovers.

title: Armatus
description: A mech combat game focused on heavy customization. Build your own armored core from scratch and battle in destructible arenas. Armatus offers deep mechanical tuning and intense, metallic combat.

title: At Fate's End
description: A narrative-heavy RPG inspired by Norse mythology. Play as a warrior destined to die in Ragnarok, trying to change your fate. The game features a choice-driven story and tactical combat where every decision matters.

title: Athelan Battlegrounds
description: A fantasy battle royale where magic and steel collide. 100 players drop into the mystical land of Athelan to fight for supremacy. Use spells, enchanted weapons, and mounts to outlast your opponents in a shrinking magical circle.

title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes
description: Command the remnants of the Colonial Fleet in this survival strategy game. Manage resources, morale, and political tensions while evading the relentless Cylon pursuit. Every jump could be your last in this tense adaptation of the beloved series.

title: Beast of Reincarnation
description: A dark fantasy action RPG where you play as a cursed beast seeking humanity. Absorb the souls of your enemies to regain human form or embrace your monstrous nature for power. The game features a gothic world and challenging, deliberate combat.

title: Bestiario
description: A turn-based RPG steeped in Spanish mythology. Investigate supernatural mysteries in a modern setting, battling creatures from folklore. The game combines social simulation elements with dungeon crawling.

title: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement
description: Koji Igarashi returns with a new entry in the Bloodstained saga. The Scarlet Engagement features a new protagonist and a massive demon castle to explore. Expect refined 2.5D gameplay, a vast array of weapons and shards, and the series' signature gothic aesthetic.

title: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift
description: The controversial vehicular combat game returns as a roguelite. Smash, crash, and run over pedestrians in procedurally generated cityscapes. Upgrade your death machine with insane weapons and try to survive as long as possible in this chaotic arcade racer.

title: Celestial Return
description: A sci-fi RPG about the return of humanity to a ruined Earth. Explore the overgrown ruins of civilization, negotiate with mutant factions, and uncover the truth behind the exodus. The game features deep tactical combat and branching dialogue.

title: Clean Up Earth
description: A satisfying simulation game where you play as an alien janitor tasked with cleaning up a polluted Earth. Use high-tech vacuums and lasers to remove trash, restore nature, and maybe abduct a few cows along the way.

title: Control Resonant
description: Remedy Entertainment expands the Control universe with this multiplayer spinoff. Agents of the FBC must team up to contain paranatural threats in the Oldest House. Use telekinetic powers and the Service Weapon in cooperative missions against the Hiss.

title: CrisisX
description: A massive open-world survival game set after a global biological disaster. Scavenge, craft, and build in a persistent online world. CrisisX emphasizes realism and player interaction as you rebuild civilization from the ashes.

title: Crown of Greed
description: A real-time strategy game with a twist: you cannot directly control your units. Instead, you must issue orders and offer gold rewards to influence independent heroes and mercenaries. Build your kingdom and manipulate the greed of your subjects to win wars.

title: Cthulhu
description: An investigative RPG that delves into the Lovecraftian mythos. As a detective in the 1920s, uncover a cult summoning the Great Old One. Manage your sanity and make desperate choices in a story where knowledge is dangerous.

title: Danganronpa 2x2
description: The killing game returns with a new twist. Danganronpa 2x2 features two separate groups of students trapped in connected locations. Solve dual mysteries and engage in high-speed class trials where truth and lies blur across two perspectives.

title: Decapolice
description: A crime-suspense RPG from Level-5. Play as a detective who can dive into a virtual world to solve crimes. Gather evidence in the real world and battle criminals in the virtual space using a unique turn-based combat system.

title: Denshattack!
description: A frantic arcade game where you defend a Japanese commuter train from alien invaders. Use everyday items as weapons and keep the train running on time while fighting off waves of enemies. A quirky blend of action and time management.

title: Directive 8020
description: The next installment in The Dark Pictures Anthology takes horror to space. A colony ship crashes on a hostile planet, and the crew is stalked by a shapeshifting alien organism. Make life-or-death choices that determine who survives in this cinematic thriller.

title: Dosa Divas: One Last Meal
description: A narrative cooking game about running a South Indian street food stall. Serve customers, learn their stories, and perfect your dosa recipes. The game explores themes of community, heritage, and the comfort of food.

title: Dracamar
description: An aerial combat game where you ride dragons. Explore a floating archipelago, engage in dogfights with rival dragon riders, and customize your mount with armor and abilities. Experience the freedom of flight in a vibrant fantasy world.

title: Edge of Memories
description: A surreal puzzle adventure about exploring the subconscious mind. Navigate dreamlike landscapes representing different memories and emotions. Solve puzzles to unlock suppressed secrets and piece together the protagonist's past.

title: Emberville
description: A cozy village sim where you play as a living flame. Help the villagers by lighting their hearths, cooking food, and warding off the cold. Be careful not to burn everything down in this heartwarming indie game.

title: End of Abyss
description: A hardcore sci-fi slasher set on a derelict space station. Fight through hordes of cybernetic monstrosities using a high-tech energy blade. The game features fast, punishing combat and a dark industrial atmosphere.

title: Evil Inside VR
description: A terrifying VR psychological horror experience. Explore a constantly changing house as you try to contact spirits via a Ouija board. Designed to exploit the immersion of VR, this game will test your nerves with jump scares and psychological tension.

title: Fable
description: Playground Games reboots the legendary RPG series. Return to the land of Albion in a new open-world adventure filled with British humor, magical creatures, and moral choices. Forge your own path as a hero or villain in this visually stunning fantasy epic.

title: Fate/Extra Record
description: A full remake of the PSP classic Fate/Extra. Enter the Moon Cell Automaton and participate in the Holy Grail War. The game features completely redone graphics, a revamped combat system that blends turn-based strategy with real-time elements, and an expanded story.

title: Fire Emblem: Fortune's Weave
description: The Fire Emblem series arrives on the new Nintendo console with stunning visual upgrades. Fortune's Weave introduces a new continent divided by fate, where player choices dramatically alter the storyline and available units. Expect classic tactical gameplay with new 'Threads of Fate' mechanics.

title: Forbidden Solitaire
description: A solitaire game with a Lovecraftian twist. Unlock forbidden knowledge by clearing cards, but beware of madness effects that change the rules of the game. A unique blend of casual card gameplay and cosmic horror atmosphere.

title: Forza Horizon 6
description: The Horizon festival travels to a breathtaking new location in Japan. Forza Horizon 6 offers the largest and most diverse open world yet, featuring neon-lit city streets, winding mountain touge, and scenic countryside. The game pushes graphical boundaries with next-gen lighting and physics.

title: Gallipoli
description: A harrowing first-person shooter focused on the Gallipoli campaign of World War I. Experience the brutal trench warfare and amphibious assaults from both Allied and Ottoman perspectives. The game emphasizes historical accuracy and the human cost of war.

title: Game of Thrones: War for Westeros
description: A grand strategy game set in the world of A Song of Ice and Fire. Choose a noble house and vie for the Iron Throne through diplomacy, warfare, and intrigue. Manage your lands, raise armies, and navigate the treacherous politics of Westeros.

title: Gothic 1 Remake
description: Return to the colony in this faithful remake of the cult classic RPG. Survive in a brutal open world where every decision has consequences and the wildlife is deadly. The game features modernized combat and controls while preserving the atmospheric grit of the original.

title: Hack 'n' Stack
description: A cooperative puzzle game about hackers in a cyberpunk future. Work together to bypass security systems, one player typing code while the other manipulates hardware blocks in 3D space. Fast communication is key to avoiding detection.

title: Hela
description: A charming open-world game where you play as a mouse exploring the Scandinavian countryside. Help the local spirits, gather resources, and solve environmental puzzles. Hela offers a beautiful, relaxing experience with a focus on exploration and kindness.

title: Hordes of Fate
description: A horde-survival shooter set in a grimdark fantasy world. Use guns, magic, and traps to hold off endless waves of demons. The game features deep character customization and up to 4-player co-op action.

title: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
description: A co-op FPS inspired by 80s action and horror movies. Team up with friends to blast through hordes of mutated creatures using over-the-top weapons and vehicles. The game captures the campy, gory fun of John Carpenter's classic films.

title: Kingdom Loop
description: A strategic roguelike that combines deckbuilding with city-building. Place tiles to expand your kingdom and defend it from daily attacks. Each loop brings new challenges and opportunities to optimize your perfect fortress.

title: Kiln
description: A physics-based multiplayer brawler where you play as animated clay figures. Mold your character into different shapes to gain advantages in combat. The game features hilarious ragdoll physics and creative arena hazards.

title: Kusan: City of Wolves
description: A top-down shooter set in a futuristic version of Korea. Play as a veteran fixer with a cybernetic arm. The game features fast, Hotline Miami-style combat where one hit can be fatal, set against a stylish neo-noir backdrop.

title: Limit Zero Breakers
description: A high-speed action game focusing on aerial combat and combos. Dash through futuristic cityscapes, defying gravity and taking down robotic enemies. The game features an adrenaline-pumping electronic soundtrack.

title: Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland
description: A beautiful hand-drawn platformer based on the classic comic strip. Explore the dream world of Slumberland, unlock new abilities by feeding candy to animals, and stop the Nightmare King. A nostalgic adventure for all ages.

title: Lords of the Fallen 2
description: The sequel to the 2023 dark fantasy RPG. Journey once again between the realms of the living (Axiom) and the dead (Umbral). Expect polished combat, even more grotesque enemy designs, and a darker, more expansive world to conquer.

title: Mad King Redemption
description: A narrative RPG where you play as a deposed tyrant trying to reclaim his throne. Will you learn from your past mistakes and become a benevolent ruler, or embrace your madness to crush the rebellion? Your choices shape the fate of the kingdom.

title: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
description: A cinematic action-adventure from Skydance New Media. Play as Captain America and Black Panther (Azzuri) in occupied Paris during WWII. The game focuses on narrative storytelling and intense combat as these two heroes form an uneasy alliance against Hydra.

title: Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls
description: A new 2.5D fighting game featuring Marvel's street-level heroes and supernatural warriors. Battle with characters like Daredevil, Iron Fist, and Ghost Rider in stylized arenas. The game emphasizes grounded martial arts combat and flashy super moves.

title: Marvel's Wolverine
description: Insomniac Games brings the legendary X-Man to life in a mature, standalone action game. Experience a gritty story that delves into Logan's past, featuring visceral combat that lets you unleash the berserker rage of Wolverine and his adamantium claws.

title: Maseylia: Echoes of the Past
description: A puzzle-adventure game set in a mysterious, overgrown ruin. Use sound-based mechanics to activate ancient machinery and communicate with spirits. The game features a serene atmosphere and a story about memory and nature.

title: Metro Rivals: New York
description: An arcade-style racing and combat game set in the subway tunnels of a futuristic New York City. Pilot hover-trains at breakneck speeds, fighting rival gangs for control of the underground. Fast, furious, and neon-soaked action.

title: Mortal Shell 2
description: The sequel to the hit indie Soulslike. Mortal Shell 2 expands the shell-swapping mechanic with more diverse bodies to inhabit, each with unique skill trees. Explore a hauntingly beautiful world filled with grotesque enemies and deep lore.

title: Mudang: Two Hearts
description: An action-adventure game inspired by Korean shamanism. Play as a Mudang (shaman) bridging the world of the living and the dead. Use spiritual tools and martial arts to exorcise vengeful spirits in a modern Seoul overrun by the supernatural.

title: Nocturnal 2
description: The sequel to the atmospheric action-platformer. Nocturnal 2 brings back the unique fire mechanic, where you must keep your flame lit to see and fight in the darkness. Explore a larger, more interconnected world shrouded in eternal night.

title: No Stone Unturned
description: A comedic detective RPG where the culprit is always a rock. Literally. Interrogate inanimate objects, solve absurd mysteries, and uncover the stony truth in a world that takes 'dumb as a rock' to a new level.

title: No Vacation For An Executioner
description: A frantic management game where you play as the grim reaper's busiest employee. Process souls, maintain the afterlife bureaucracy, and deal with escape attempts. A darkly funny game about workplace stress in hell.

title: Oblitacrater
description: A vehicle combat game set in a giant crater on Mars. Customize your hover-tank with massive guns and physics-based weaponry. Battle other players for control of the remaining resources in a destructible arena.

title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
description: Capcom revives the classic samurai survival horror series. Onimusha: Way of the Sword returns to Sengoku-era Japan with a new protagonist. Fight demonic Genma with precise swordplay and magical gauntlets in a game that blends history with dark fantasy.

title: Ontos
description: A philosophical first-person horror game exploring the nature of consciousness. Explore a surreal, shifting landscape that reacts to your thoughts and fears. The game features non-euclidean geometry and a mind-bending narrative.

title: Orbitals
description: A gravity-defying platformer where you jump between small planetoids. Use momentum and orbital mechanics to navigate treacherous space hazards. A colorful and challenging game with a unique traversal system.

title: Order of the Sinking Star
description: A mystical puzzle game where you align stars to cast spells. Play as an astronomer trying to prevent a celestial catastrophe. The game features beautiful constellations and relaxing, atmospheric gameplay.

title: Outbound
description: A cozy camper-van exploration game. Build your own mobile home on wheels and travel across a futuristic utopian world. Generate your own energy, grow crops on the roof, and craft automation to make your journey comfortable.

title: Out of Words
description: A narrative adventure where words are physical objects. Collect words from the environment and use them to complete sentences, solve puzzles, and influence the story. A unique game about the power of language and communication.

title: Outward 2
description: The sequel to the hardcore open-world RPG simulator. Outward 2 offers a more polished and expansive experience, challenging players to survive not just monsters, but the elements, hunger, and disease. No chosen one here, just an adventurer trying to survive.

title: Path of Mystery: A Bruch With Death
description: A hand-painted adventure game following a young artist who can bring her drawings to life. Solve creative puzzles and explore a whimsical world threatened by a creeping darkness known as 'The Blank'.

title: Planet of Lana 2
description: Return to the stunning hand-painted world of Lana. This sequel expands the puzzle-platforming adventure with new companions and mechanics. Explore lush forests and alien machinery in a cinematic journey about harmony between nature and technology.

title: Port of Jumanah
description: A trading simulation set in a mythical Arabian Nights-inspired setting. Captain a merchant ship, trade exotic spices and silks, and navigate the politics of the bustling Port of Jumanah. A game about commerce, diplomacy, and adventure.

title: PVKK
description: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant (Planet Defense Cannon Commander). Manage a massive planetary defense cannon from inside its claustrophobic cockpit. Sip tea, push buttons, and wipe out alien fleets in this immersive and atmospheric simulation.

title: Quartermaster
description: A war game where you don't fight, you supply. Manage the logistics of a massive army campaign. Produce weapons, route supply lines, and ensure the soldiers on the front have food and ammo. A unique take on the strategy genre.

title: Resonance: A Plague Tale Legacy
description: A spinoff of the acclaimed Plague Tale series. Set in a new era, explore the lingering effects of the Macula. Featuring new protagonists and stealth-focused gameplay, Resonance delves deeper into the supernatural history of the rat plague.

title: Road Truckers: New Beginning
description: The ultimate trucking simulation reboot. Drive massive rigs across a seamless, 1:1 scale map of a fictional country. Manage your cargo, maintain your vehicle, and enjoy the zen of the open road with improved physics and graphics.

title: SacriFire
description: A modern RPG with a retro heart. SacriFire features a stunning 2.5D pixel art style and a combat system that blends real-time and turn-based action. Follow the story of Ezekiel, a young soldier trapped in a war between gods and demons.

title: Sea of Remnants
description: An atmospheric exploration game set in a drowned world. Sail a solitary boat across a vast, quiet ocean, diving into ruins of skyscrapers to uncover the history of the fall. A contemplative game about isolation and discovery.

title: Seina: A Tale of Spirits
description: A Ghibli-esque adventure game about a girl who can see spirits. Help lost souls find peace in a lush, magical forest. The game features non-violent gameplay focused on empathy, exploration, and helping others.

title: Shadowman: Darque Legacy
description: The Shadowman returns to walk the line between Life and Deadside. This new action-horror game features brutal combat and dark voodoo magic. Protect humanity from the horrors of the underworld in a gritty, atmospheric adventure.

title: Shadow of the Road
description: A tactical turn-based RPG set in a steampunk feudal Japan. Assemble a team of samurai, spies, and mechanized warriors. The game offers a rich story of honor and betrayal with deep strategic combat.

title: Shipping Store Simulator 2037
description: Manage a futuristic logistics hub in this detailed simulation game. Sort packages, manage drone delivery fleets, and deal with demanding customers in a high-tech warehouse environment. Efficiency is key to success.

title: Silent Planet - Elegy of a Dying World
description: A melancholic sci-fi exploration game. Wander the silent ruins of an alien civilization, piecing together their history through environmental storytelling. A game about loneliness, beauty, and the passage of time.

title: Silver Pines
description: A 2D survival horror game set in a mysterious 1980s summer camp. Scavenge for resources, hide from a masked killer, and uncover the dark secrets of the woods. The game features a retro pixel art style and intense stealth gameplay.

title: Slay the Spire 2 early access
description: The king of deckbuilding roguelikes returns. Slay the Spire 2 introduces new characters, mechanics, and enemies. Build powerful decks, discover game-breaking synergies, and climb the Spire once again in this highly anticipated sequel.

title: Squadron 42
description: The massive single-player campaign set in the Star Citizen universe. Featuring a star-studded cast including Mark Hamill and Gary Oldman, Squadron 42 offers a cinematic space combat experience with cutting-edge visuals and seamless transitions between space and ground.

title: Springs, Eternal
description: A management sim about running a mystical hot spring for spirits. Build baths, brew teas, and ensure your ghostly guests are relaxed. A soothing game with a charming art style and low-stakes gameplay.

title: Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War
description: The only good bug is a dead bug! Join the Mobile Infantry in this large-scale shooter. Fight against thousands of Arachnids on screen simultaneously using advanced weaponry and base-building mechanics.

title: Star Wars: Galactic Racer
description: Podracing returns in a high-speed arcade racer. Build your own pod, race across iconic Star Wars planets, and dodge obstacles at breakneck speeds. The game features a career mode and competitive online multiplayer.

title: Star Wars: Zero Company
description: A gritty tactical shooter focusing on a squad of non-clone troopers during the Clone Wars. Complete dangerous missions behind enemy lines without the support of the Jedi. A darker, more grounded take on the Star Wars galaxy.

title: Stupid Never Dies
description: A slapstick physics platformer where death is part of the puzzle. Hurl your ragdoll character into traps, spikes, and explosions to create platforms for your next life. A hilarious game about failing forward.

title: Subnautica 2 early access
description: Dive into a new alien ocean in the sequel to the hit survival game. Subnautica 2 introduces co-op gameplay, deeper depths, and terrifying new leviathans. Explore vivid biomes, build underwater bases, and uncover the secrets of the planet.

title: Sudden Strike 5
description: The classic RTS series returns with huge WWII battles. Command massive armies with realistic vehicle damage and tactical depth. Sudden Strike 5 focuses on strategic positioning and resource management in dynamic battlefields.

title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Ballabel Park
description: The definitive version of the hit platformer, enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2. Enjoy 4K visuals, new Wonder Effects, and an exclusive new world, 'Ballabel Park'. This edition brings even more creativity and chaos to the Mushroom Kingdom.

title: Super Meat Boy 3D
description: Team Meat brings their punishing platformer into the third dimension. Run, jump, and die in deviously designed 3D levels. The game retains the tight controls and instant respawns of the original while adding new spatial challenges.

title: The Adventures of Elliot: The Millennium Tales
description: A grand fantasy adventure following Elliot, a young hero destined to save the millennium. Explore a vibrant world, solve dungeon puzzles, and battle monsters in real-time combat. A heartfelt tribute to classic 3D adventure games.

title: The Alighieri Circle: Dante's Bloodline
description: A dark action RPG loosely based on Dante's Inferno. Play as a descendant of Dante traveling through a modern interpretation of the nine circles of hell. Fight demons with holy magic and uncover a conspiracy spanning centuries.

title: The Backworld
description: A liminal space exploration game. Wander through endless, empty hallways, abandoned malls, and surreal office spaces. The game focuses on atmosphere and the unsettling feeling of nostalgia and isolation.

title: The Blood of Dawnwalker
description: A vampire hunting action game set in a steampunk Victorian London. Use a variety of gadgets and supernatural abilities to hunt down elder vampires. The game features fast, stylish combat and a dark, immersive world.

title: The Dungeon Experience
description: A first-person comedy adventure where you visit a dungeon theme park run by a level 1 goblin. Participate in 'quests', meet the 'monsters', and uncover the absurdity of RPG tropes in this hilarious narrative game.

title: The Duskbloods
description: An open-world RPG set in a world of eternal twilight. Join a clan of monster hunters protecting humanity from the creatures of the dark. Features dynamic combat, deep crafting, and a reactive world that changes based on your actions.

title: The Mound: Omen of Cthulu
description: A survival horror game based on the works of H.P. Lovecraft. Explore an archaeological dig site in the desert where an ancient evil is stirring. Manage your resources and sanity as you descend deeper into the earth.

title: The Occultist
description: Play as Alan Rebels, an occult investigator searching for his missing father on a cursed island. Use your spectral pendulum to communicate with the dead and manipulate the environment. A first-person horror game focused on investigation and atmosphere.

title: The Sinking City 2
description: Frogwares returns to their Lovecraftian world in this survival horror sequel. Explore the flooded city of Arkham in the 1920s, battling eldritch monsters and solving mysteries. This entry shifts focus towards intense combat and survival mechanics.

title: Thick as Thieves
description: A co-op heist game about a pair of clumsy burglars. Plan intricate robberies, avoid security systems, and improvise when everything inevitably goes wrong. A game that balances tension with slapstick comedy.

title: Titan Quest 2 1.0 version
description: The legendary ARPG returns. Battle mythological beasts in ancient Greece as you face the Goddess of Retribution, Nemesis. Create your own hero with a flexible class system and collect epic loot in a handcrafted open world.

title: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
description: Lara Croft embarks on a new expedition to find the lost city of Atlantis. This unified timeline adventure combines the grittiness of the survivor trilogy with the acrobatic flair of the classics. Solve complex tombs and fight enemies in exotic locations.

title: UnGodly
description: A boss-rush action game where you fight literal gods. Use skill, timing, and pattern recognition to defeat colossal deities from various mythologies. A challenging experience designed for quick, intense sessions.

title: Valor Mortis
description: A tactical medieval extraction game. Enter a plague-ridden city to loot treasure and escape before the bells toll. Fight other players and AI guards in brutal melee combat where armor and stamina management are crucial.

title: Wabisabi SushiDerby
description: A cute simulation game where you raise sushi ingredients like racehorses. Train your tuna, salmon, and shrimp to win the Sushi Derby. A bizarre yet charming mix of pet raising and racing simulation.

title: Warhammer Survivors
description: A 'bullet heaven' survivor game set in the Warhammer 40k universe. Play as a Space Marine mowing down endless hordes of Tyranids and Orks. Unlock iconic weapons and upgrades to become an unstoppable force of the Emperor.

title: Wax Heads
description: A narrative puzzle game where you run a struggling record store. Organize vinyl, recommend music to quirky customers, and solve mysteries hidden in the album art. A love letter to physical media and music culture.

title: Well Keeper
description: A roguelike defense game where you protect a village's only water source. Build defenses during the day and fight off monsters at night. Venture into the well to find resources and uncover the source of the corruption.

title: Witchbrook
description: A magical school life simulator from Chucklefish. Attend classes, learn spells, grow magical crops, and build relationships with fellow students and townsfolk. A charming pixel-art game often described as Stardew Valley meets Harry Potter.

title: Worlds Explorers
description: A procedural exploration game focused on discovery. Pilot a spaceship to uncharted planets, catalogue alien flora and fauna, and build outposts. The game emphasizes peaceful exploration and scientific discovery over combat.

title: WWE 2K26
description: Step inside the ring with the most realistic wrestling game ever made. WWE 2K26 features an updated roster of Superstars, improved physics, and new match types. MyGM and Universe modes receive significant overhauls for more control over your wrestling empire.

title: Yoshi and the Mysterious Book
description: Yoshi stars in a new pop-up book adventure. The world is made of papercraft and cardboard, allowing Yoshi to fold and tear the environment to solve puzzles. A delightful platformer with a unique aesthetic perfect for the new Nintendo console.

title: Ys Memoire: Revelations in Celceta
description: A remastered version of the beloved action RPG Ys: Memories of Celceta. Explore the Great Forest of Celceta with Adol Christin, mapping the uncharted wilderness and recovering his lost memories. Features high-definition visuals and optimized controls.

title: Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis
description: A frantic rhythm game about a fan obsessed with an idol group. Tap to the beat of high-energy denpa songs while navigating a bizarre and humorous storyline. The game features challenging charts and a colorful, chaotic anime aesthetic.

title: Zero Parades
description: A surreal exploration game set in a never-ending parade. Walk through strange, dreamlike environments filled with bizarre floats and characters. A unique audio-visual experience that explores themes of celebration and emptiness.

title: Chronicles: Medieval
description: A grand strategy real-time game that aims to revitalize the classic RTS genre. Manage your kingdom, raise armies, and engage in large-scale medieval warfare. The game focuses on historical authenticity and deep strategic mechanics.

title: Alkahest
description: A first-person action RPG set in a gritty medieval fantasy world. Alkahest emphasizes physics-based combat and environmental interaction, allowing players to use alchemy and the surroundings to defeat enemies in creative ways, reminiscent of Dark Messiah.

title: Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag Resynced
description: A rumored remake of the beloved pirate adventure. Experience the Golden Age of Piracy with Edward Kenway in stunning modern graphics. The game is expected to feature updated naval combat mechanics and a seamless open Caribbean world powered by the Anvil engine.

title: Chrono Odyssey
description: A next-generation open-world MMORPG centered around time manipulation. The game features stunning visuals, massive boss battles, and a unique 'Chronotector' system that allows players to stop or rewind time during combat to gain a tactical advantage.

title: Light No Fire
description: From the creators of No Man's Sky comes a game about adventure, building, survival, and exploration together. Set on a massive, procedurally generated fantasy planet the size of Earth, players can explore deep oceans, high mountains, and dense forests in a shared multiplayer world.

title: Solasta 2
description: The sequel to the acclaimed tactical RPG Solasta: Crown of the Magister. Expected to utilize the updated SRD 5.1 ruleset, offering deep turn-based combat, verticality, and a faithful adaptation of tabletop Dungeons & Dragons mechanics in a brand new campaign.

title: Streets of Rogue 2
description: A massive open-world immersive sim that ramps up the chaos of the original. Drive vehicles, farm, build, and fight across a procedurally generated country. The game offers limitless freedom to solve problems your way, whether through violence, stealth, or hacking.

title: Blackfrost: The Long Dark 2
description: The next chapter in the quiet apocalypse. Building on the brutal realism of the original, Blackfrost introduces new weather systems, expanded crafting, and a deeper narrative about survival in the frozen Canadian wilderness.

title: Railborn
description: A charming puzzle game about fixing train connections. Lay down tracks, switch junctions, and ensure the cargo gets to its destination across beautifully crafted landscapes. A relaxing experience for fans of logic puzzles.

title: Windrose
description: A mystical adventure game centered around a magical compass. Navigate a world of floating islands and shifting winds. The game emphasizes exploration and uncovering the history of a civilization lost to the skies.

title: Enshrouded 1.0 Release
description: The full release of the hit survival action RPG. Enshrouded 1.0 brings the complete story of the Flameborn, new biomes to explore, and expanded building mechanics. Fight back the Shroud and reclaim your kingdom in this voxel-based open world.

title: Rooted
description: A stunning post-apocalyptic survival game powered by Unreal Engine 5. Set in the year 2100, nature has reclaimed the world. Scavenge for resources, build a shelter, and survive in a lush but dangerous environment inspired by The Last of Us.

title: Petal Runner
description: A Slice-of-Life RPG set in a cyberpunk world, featuring Game Boy Color aesthetic. Play as a courier delivering flowers and befriending a cast of quirky characters. The game combines motorcycle minigames with a heartfelt story about connection.

title: Gears of War: E-Day
description: A prequel to the legendary saga, set fourteen years before the first Gears of War. Experience the horror of Emergence Day through the eyes of a young Marcus Fenix and Dom Santiago. The game returns to the dark, horror-tinged tone of the original, powered by Unreal Engine 5.

title: The Expanse: Osiris Reborn
description: A new narrative adventure set in the universe of The Expanse. Following the events of the TV series, players navigate the fragile politics of the system as a Belter captain. The game features zero-g exploration and high-stakes decision-making.

title: Halo: Campaign Evolved
description: A ground-up remake of the campaign that started it all. Halo: Campaign Evolved reimagines the crash landing on Alpha Halo with expanded levels, modern gameplay mechanics, and ray-traced visuals, while staying true to the legendary journey of the Master Chief.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 4
description: The next chapter in the gritty military shooter franchise. Modern Warfare 4 continues the story of Task Force 141 as they face a new global threat. Expect cinematic campaign missions, a robust multiplayer suite, and the return of fan-favorite maps.

title: I Am Jesus Christ
description: A realistic simulator game inspired by stories from the New Testament. Play as Jesus Christ, performing miracles, interacting with biblical figures, and journeying from baptism to resurrection. The game aims to provide a unique, interactive perspective on the life of Christ.
